content: it s snow time by elena maltseva february 2025 it s snow time by elena maltseva it s snow time by elena maltseva february 2025 materials any yarn weight  4 dpns in size recommended for the yarn  circular needle in corresponding size or scrap yarn  tapestry needle for weaving in the ends  notes 1 size will vary depending on yarn and needles chosen 2 lacy points the points of the snowflake are formed by a series of cast ons/bind offs otherwise known as picots after completing each sequence of cast ons/bind offs place the last stitch back to your lh needle before you begin the next sequence 3 stiffening block out your finished snowflake you will also need to stiffen it if you want to use it as a hanging ornament use any stiffener you prefer 4 note on round 6 round 6 is a bind off round that shapes the legs points of the snowflake in this round after binding off the required number of stitches always remember to place the stitch from rh needle back to lh needle before casting on new stitches 5 tutorial  it s snow time you tube tutorial part 1 https //youtu be/uvwzjkt2wcq part 2 https //youtu be/h5lpdkvp1z0  snowflake blocking template https //www pinterest com/pin/169659110942488867/ it s snow time by elena maltseva february 2025 abbreviations k knit p purl sl slip_stitch as if to purl yo2 wrap yarn over the needle 2 times chain 8 chain 8 knit into the stitch on your lh needle slip the new stitch of the lh needle knitting into the newly-made stitch make another stitch continue until the required number of stitches has been made note the process is basically identical to chain stitch in crocheting bobble bind off knit the first stitch knit the next stitch slip the first stitch over the second stitch or slip slip knit then place the stitch from rh needle back to lh needle repeat as many times as required kco knitted cast on with your rh needle knit into the stitch on the lh needle pull a new stitch through then slip the new stitch back to lh needle at the same time make sure not to slip the stitch you ve knitted into off the lh needle = 1 stitch added next knit into the stitch you just made pull a new stitch through then slip the new stitch back to lh needle = 2 stitches added example if the pattern notes say to kco3 stitches repeat the process until you get the necessary number of stitches in this case 3 + 1 the first stitch you knitted into rh right-hand needle lh left-hand needle it s snow time by elena maltseva february 2025 snowflake cast on 6 stitches using long tail cast on distribute between 3 needles 2 stitches per needle and join to knit in the round round 1 knit into the front leg of the stitch then slip the back leg
